item.title: links for 2007-12-03
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• US says it has right to kidnap British citizens
    A senior lawyer for the American government has told the Court of Appeal in London that kidnapping foreign citizens is permissible under American law because the US Supreme Court has sanctioned it.
    (tags: article security travel wow)
  • The 40 Worst Rob Liefeld Drawings
    Rob Liefeld and his "art"
    (tags: art comic funny humor image list)
  • Swift Boat publishers rip off their writers
    Regnery Publishing, the slimy house that produced "Unfit for Command: Swift Boat Veterans Speak Out Against John Kerry" and other works of popular demagoguery, is being sued by its writers for ripping them off on royalty payments.
    (tags: book publishing karma politics)
  • PHP Object Generator
    HP Object Generator, (POG) is an open source PHP code generator which automatically generates clean & tested Object Oriented code for your PHP4/PHP5 application.
    (tags: classes development php opensource programming software tool tools utility web)
  • Lego Requiem for a Dream
    Comic about the Lego Requiem for a Dream video game
    (tags: game film funny comic humor)
